evidence: Akash Kapoor, a backend engineer at DataStreamX, is accused of manipulating an internal API service to exfiltrate confidential customer data including analytics logs, IP addresses, and customer usage patterns. The data was later found on the dark web.

judgment.reasoning: Evidence suggests wrongdoing related to data theft. While some elements of the claim are supported, the evidence lacks comprehensive detail. Awarding 54% of requested damages.
specificFindings: Additional evidence would strengthen the case
